page.title: 02ELMBRIDGE - FAMILY STRUCTURE
page.content: Out of approximately 140 people living in this area only 3 lived alone, 2 of whom were senior citizens,both having lived in the district for many years, the other moved from Birmingham 2 years ago. Other senior citizens were either couples living in their own houses or living with their adult married children,most of whom had not lived here for more than a few years. There were 2 couples and 5 single parents living with their adult families and in most cases the younger parents were working. Of the families with children,the average was 2 of school age. There was one family of 4, 2 of whom did not live at home,1 family with a baby and 1 where a first baby was expeced.
